Control Name: Maintain and implement policies and procedures to manage service providers with whom cardholder data is shared, or that could affect the security of cardholder data, as follows:\nEnsure there is an established process for engaging service providers including proper due diligence prior to engagement.

control_attributes.Control: Maintain and implement policies and procedures to manage service providers with whom cardholder data is shared, or that could affect the security of cardholder data, as follows:\nEnsure there is an established process for engaging service providers including proper due diligence prior to engagement.
control_attributes.Requirement: 12.8.3.Maintain a policy that addresses information security for all personnel
